thread.title: Kevin Hart adds second Winnipeg show
thread.title_full: Kevin Hart adds second Winnipeg show

title: Kevin Hart adds second Winnipeg show
text:
Report an error 
Comedian Kevin Hart has added a second Winnipeg show to his stand-up tour. 
With his initial Nov. 19 show at MTS Centre a near sell-out, the comedian and actor has added a late-night show for that same date, this one starting at 10 p.m. 
Tickets range in price from $49.50 to $125, plus taxes and fees, and go on sale to the general public on Oct. 23 via Ticketmaster. Sponsored Links Kevin Hart adds second Winnipeg show 
Winnipeg SUn Friday, October 16, 2015 01:19 PM CDT | Updated: Friday, October 16, 2015 01:41 PM CDT 
Comedian Kevin Hart has added a second Winnipeg show to his stand-up tour. 
With his initial Nov. 19 show at MTS Centre a near sell-out, the comedian and actor has added a late-night show for that same date, this one starting at 10 p.m. 
Tickets range in price from $49.50 to $125, plus taxes and fees, and go on sale to the general public on Oct. 23 via Ticketmaster. Top stories
